Projects.text1: You can only read the book when you understand the language.
Projects.text2: «The Book of Ink» is an ongoing project dedicated to the tattooed people and paintings on their bodies. Black works, full body sleeves, tattooed faces and intimate parts, tiny lines and small letters - all are a unique narrative of the tattoo holders.
Projects.text3: Aimed as an encyclopedia, the goal of this project is to tell the story to the ones who understand the language and teach this language to those unfamiliar with it.

About.text1: Valentin Zhmodikov is a Russian-Australian photographer with an interest in portraiture, landscape and music. Specialising in both art and commercial photography, in his work he aims to encapsulate not only the shape and beauty of the subject but its essence and nature.
About.text2: Having a background in philosophy, he seizes undercover phenomena of people and events through a game of lines, subtle movements & facial expressions, shapes & shadows.
About.text3: Capturing everyday people, professional models and celebrities from all around the world he extracts their personality in his own unique manner.
